Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Taychreggan Hotel in Taynuilt (Kilchrenan), you'll be within the vicinity of Loch Awe and Cruachan Power Station. This hotel is within the region of Ben Cruachan and Kilchurn Castle.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 18 guestrooms. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the 18 guestrooms. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

With a stay at Taychreggan Hotel in Taynuilt (Kilchrenan), you'll be within the vicinity of Loch Awe and Cruachan Power Station. This hotel is within the region of Ben Cruachan and Kilchurn Castle.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Loch Awe - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Cruachan Power Station - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Ben Cruachan - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi
Kilchurn Castle - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Inveraray Castle - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
Arctic Penguin - 14.6 km / 9 mi
Inveraray Jail - 14.6 km / 9.1 mi
Connel Bridge - 17.5 km / 10.9 mi
Glencruitten Golf Club - 17.9 km / 11.1 mi
Ardkinglas Woodland Garden - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi
McCaig's Tower - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi
Oban Distillery - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi
Oban Ferry Terminal - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi
St. John's Cathedral - 18.9 km / 11.7 mi
Oban War and Peace Museum - 19.3 km / 12 mi

The preferred airport for Taychreggan Hotel is Glasgow (GLA-Glasgow Intl.) - 71.2 km / 44.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

FROM GLASGOW TO TAYCHREGGAN IS APPROXIMATELY 88MILES AND WILL TAKE 2 TO 2 HOURS DEPENDING ONROAD TRAFFIC CONDITIONS.FROM GLASGOW, FOLLOW THEM8 *GREENOCK* AND SIGNS FOR THE ERSKINE BRIDGE.THIS IS A TOLL BRIDGE *60P*. WHEN YOU CROSS THEBRIDGE, TURN LEFT, FOLLOWING THE SIGNPOST FORCRIANLARICH. YOU TRAVEL ALONG SIDE OF LOCHLOMOND, THEN, WHEN YOU REACH TARBET YOU HAVE TWOOPTIONS1. GO STRAIGHT ON, FOLLOWING THE SIGNS FORARROCHAR AND INVERARAY.FOLLOW THE ROAD TOINVERARAY WHERE YOU SHOULD TURN RIGHT*THROUGH THEARCHWAY* ONTO THE A819, SIGNED TO OBAN.2. TURN RIGHT HEADING FOR THE A82 CRIANLARICH. ATCRIANLARICH YOU WILL TURN LEFT ON TO THE A85 OBANROAD.ONE MILE EAST BEFORE THE VILLAGE OFTAYNUILT, TURN LEFT ONTO THE B845 SIGNPOSTED TOKILCHRENAN. WE ARE SEVEN MILES DOWN THIS ROAD. ITIS A SINGLE TRACK ROAD, SO PLEASE USE PASSINGPLACES TO PERMIT OTHER CARS TO OVERTAKE.B. FROM EDINBURGH TO TAYCHREGGAN IS APPROXIMATELY118 MILES AND WILL TAKE YOU 2 TO 3 HOURS,DEPENDING ON ROAD TRAFFIC CONDITIONS.FROM EDINBURGH, FOLLOW THE M9 TO STIRLING. FROMSTIRLING, FOLLOW THE A84, THROUGH CALLANDER ANDLOCHEARNHEAD. AFTER LOCHEARNHEAD YOU TAKE THE A85SIGNPOSTED FOR CRIANLARICH / OBAN. THEN FOLLOW ASPER GLASGOW DIRECTIONS.C. FROM OBAN TO TAYCHREGGAN IS APPROXIMATELY 20MILES. TAKE THE A85 HEADING TOWARDS TAYNUILT ANDDALMALLY. AT TAYNUILT, TURN RIGHT ONTO THEB845--SIGNPOSTED KILCHRENAN --AND FOLLOW THISROAD 7 MILES UNTIL IT DEAD-ENDS AT THE HOTEL.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
